storyInfo: A sudden change in social status after an overnight phone call has left Malkiewicz terrified. In the end, he realizes there is no way out of his newfound responsibilities.

attributes.content: Mr. Malkiewicz!
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Over here. Please, this way, Mr. Malkiewicz!
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Oh, so this is the right place.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Sorry. I'm not too familiar with the roads here, so it took me a while. Sorry to keep you waiting.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: And thank you for agreeing to come pick me up.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: No need to thank me. It's the least I could do.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Please, this way. The venue is in the district across the way.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: R-Right.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Excuse me, but...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: No, never mind. It's nothing.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Today's forum takes place right before the Major's main events... doesn't it?
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Yes, that's right. The General Chamber of Commerce organized this meeting, and while it is a forum, the format is somewhat relaxed. All spokespersons and corporate representatives will be in attendance.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Just show the invitation letter and you'll be let in.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Of course. Of course... I have it right here...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Um, excuse me...
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Y-Yes... I'm here. Yes, please, go ahead!
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Pardon me for asking, but do you need any assistance?
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Uhh... Excuse me?
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Frightfully sorry. I noticed you've been adjusting your coat...
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: If you've run into any trouble, if there is anything I can assist you with at all, please don't hesitate to tell me.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Oh, no... My coat is fine. I mean, no, it's not a huge deal. It's just...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It's just... I'm not used to it yet... Sorry, this is a personal problem. Please don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Is that so...
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: You seem a little nervous?
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Yes, just a little. Sorry.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It's my first time at one of these forums. I'm afraid I'm... still not quite used to this.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You needn't be so nervous, Spokesman Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: This forum is a meeting organized by the General Chamber of Commerce. The spokespersons who represent the Chamber are the most esteemed attendees...
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Please, try to calm down.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: But... I'm no big shot... certainly not esteemed. I... It was just a coincidence...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Something's gone wrong somewhere. I shouldn't be here...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You are too humble, sir...
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Sorry, I have a phone call.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Please, go ahead.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Hello? This is Malkiewicz... Please go ahead.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Y-Yes, not a problem...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It fits very well. I don't need anything more. Thank you very much.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Oh, no, I should be thanking you. For sending someone.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: N-No, not at all! He's very kind, and he didn't offend me in any way whatsoever. It only took us so long because I was slow to get ready. Please, don't make things hard for him...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It's a joke...? Y-Yes... Of course...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Yes, I will be there shortly.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Okay, see you later...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Sorry to keep you waiting.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Not at all, sir.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: About what we just discussed—
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: —Agghh!
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Please watch your step, Mr. Malkiewicz!
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: We'll head upstairs via Corridor 4. Please follow me.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Uh, y-yes. Sorry.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The venue is right ahead. Please make your way there and show the attendant at the door your invitation.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Yes, yes... thanks.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: In that case, please excuse—
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: W-Wait!
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Go ahead, Mr. Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Actually... I was going to say... I'm not one of those people you'd call esteemed...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: So you really needn't talk to me like this. What I'm trying to say is... just call me Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I'm afraid that... wouldn't be appropriate.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: You are the spokesman for the General Chamber of Commerce. As a staff member of the Chamber, I admire your work, and you have my utmost respect...
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: If that's it, I really don't deserve your admiration.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I haven't done anything of importance. Perhaps everyone will realize I'm not cut out for this job after this meeting today.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: And if I got a phone call right now, telling me I'm fired right this minute, I wouldn't be surprised at all.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You're overthinking it.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: The General Chamber of Commerce must have appointed you spokesman after due consideration... Your abilities were recognized.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: My... what?
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I dialed the spokesman's number, and you answered.
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: Therefore, you are the spokesman.
attributes.name: Deep Male Voice

attributes.content: I... I don't quite think so.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: If I have to give a reason, all I can say is... perhaps it's just something Mr. Czarny came up with on a whim...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: And I was only picked because I happened to be there...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I am sorry, but I beg your pardon?
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: No, it's nothing... Don't worry about it...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Actually...
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I... I've met you before, Mr. Malkiewicz. I was fortunate enough to work on a project with you.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It's only natural that you don't remember. It happened a long time ago, after all, and it was only a brief collaboration.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Gerald, the team leader...?
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You remember my name? I'm honored.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: I knew you right away, actually... but, like you said, it was a long time ago. I wasn't sure if it was something I should bring up.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: If I remember correctly, we were reaching out to newcomers for the knightclubs... and we were assigned to the same list of names.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Yes, that's correct.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Do you remember the knights we were assigned to contact?
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I... I'm sorry, but I don't remember.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: It was a few infected knights...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Right, right. Yes, the Infected.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Please... don't call them that...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: They were just knights, unfortunate enough to get infected.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Yes... Truly unfortunate...
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: However, they were fortunate enough to have met you. Thanks to you, they were able to join a proper knightclub. I am sure that was more than those Infected... I mean, the knights could ask for.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: About that...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I think you might be mistaken. We didn't actually finish that job.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: What...? Hold on, if I recall correctly...
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Was it... the time we tried to recruit the Flametail Knight, the Fartooth Knight, those ones?
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Do you remember now? That's right. They had just won a few matches... You reminded them to review the contract the knightclub provided them.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The knights were still young. We couldn't bring ourselves to lie to them.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It's true that the knightclub's terms for the infected knights weren't very reasonable. I mean, they may seem fair at first glance.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: However, we normally wouldn't go into the fine print for the infected knights.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Right... normally, we wouldn't have done that.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Though this did have to do with the knights' future...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: No one can predict the future.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Just like... Just like you.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: If I hadn't taken a look at your file beforehand, I wouldn't have recognized you.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: I looked in the mirror before I left home this morning. If the person in the mirror hadn't waved with me, I would not have recognized myself.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: ...In any case. Thank you for remembering who I am.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: This is embarrassing to say, but I'm actually still wondering if this is all a dream.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It's just too surreal...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: If this were a dream, I imagine it must be a pleasant dream.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Y-You think so?
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Is it not?
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Well... I don't think it's necessarily one...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: To tell the truth, I think I might feel more terrified than anything else.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Terrified?
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: What are you terrified of?
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Many, many things. I hardly get any sleep, and regardless of whether all this is real or fake, nothing good will come of it... The only difference it makes is that things are bad in entirely different ways.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The way you think is... peculiar.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: R-Really...?
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Yes. After all, you are experiencing quite the rags to riches story.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: From a lowly office worker, you rose to the top and joined the big leagues... I think most of us have dreamt of something similar.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: It's something that everyone has fantasized... Indeed...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: What's so bad about it? It's not often that dreams actually come true.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Luck was on your side, Mr. Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: But I didn't really... I...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Do you really understand? There are many who envy you for what you have gone through.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: To tell the truth—At the very least, I envy you very much.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Maybe... this is why...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I beg your pardon?
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Uhh, I mean, perhaps this is what's most terrifying.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It's all going too well, too natural, and it's all too structured... It all happened way too quickly.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Just two days ago, I was worried I couldn't pay rent for the month. I wasn't able to convince Maria Nearl to join our knightclub, and I was most likely going to get a pay cut.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: That was when I ran into Mr. Czarny... He was very busy during the Major's preliminaries, and I helped run some errands.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: And then...?
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: And then I took a phone call.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: A phone call?
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: A phone call.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: From now on, you no longer belong to the Słoma Food Company, nor the Mieszko Group——Please keep in mind at all times that you are representing the General Chamber of Commerce.
attributes.name: Bold Female Voice

attributes.content: Wait...! I don't want to be...!
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: You have no right to ask questions.
attributes.name: Bold Female Voice

attributes.content: I-I don't think...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: No, I... I understand...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Very good. I wish you the best of luck.
attributes.name: Bold Female Voice

attributes.content: There was no way I could possibly understand...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Even though, from head to heels, this getup is specially tailored to make me a big deal, that doesn't mean I've really become one...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Actually, I don't think this outfit suits me at all.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Nonsense... It looks great on you.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: This may come off as rude... but I ask you to forgive me in light of us having worked together in the past.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: What is it? Please...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: A bit of advice, Mr. Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: As someone whom fortune has smiled upon, you should try to refrain from sharing your feelings to those who, like me, are less fortunate.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: I really wish to empathize with the way you feel, but alas...
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: I can't.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: There are many who wish to be in your position, myself included, but we aren't so fortunate.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Do you understand?
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: I do... but still...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Perhaps you do have your worries. You feel fear, anxiety, and hesitation... but no matter what you are feeling...
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: You are well groomed and dressed to kill, you have the invitation in your hand, and you are walking inside this building as the spokesman for the General Chamber of Commerce.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Regardless of what you think yourself, in the eyes of everyone else, you are very much a big deal.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: The venue is straight ahead, Mr. Malkiewicz. Please excuse me.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Wait...!
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I wish you a pleasant day.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: I heard you were once an entrepreneur, Mr. Malkiewicz?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Y-Yes... I founded a company with a friend before. A very small one...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It must have been a success?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: No, not at all. You flatter me.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You're too humble! If we ever get the chance, please do share with us your stories of entrepreneurship.
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Your thoughts on the treatment of the independent knights was thought-provoking too...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Right, would you like a drink? Let me get you—
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: W-Watch out!
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: M-My apologies... I am deeply sorry, Mr. Malkiewicz!
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: No, it's okay. No big deal. Please don't mind it at all...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: My god, your clothes—
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Clothes...? Uhh...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Oh, the wine...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I-I'm terribly sorry!
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: I-I'll fetch you some towels right away!
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: No, no. It's okay. I'm fine.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Uh, thanks...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Please wait a moment. Don't move. I'll wipe it clean—
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Please, you don't have to...! I-I can do it myself!
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Please take your coat off. I'm afraid it will be difficult to get the stain out. I will arrange for someone to get it dry cleaned.
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Take my coat off...?
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Oh... and if you are not satisfied with that, I can pay you for the coat...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Mr. Malkiewicz? Are you alright, Mr. Malkiewicz?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: N-No, thank you... It's okay. This is good enough. Please don't pay me anything!
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Huh? But...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: It's no problem. I mean it... Thank you.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: This will do... I'm sorry, I was in a bit of a daze...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It happens. I understand. You don't seem very well, though. Perhaps you are a little exhausted?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Were you thinking about work just now?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Uh... I suppose so...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I was just thinking about some advice I got from a friend.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I guess he was right. It turns out my own thoughts don't matter, a lot of the time...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Uh, what do you mean...?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Don't worry about it, please. I'm talking to myself, that's all.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It's just... even if I don't think I'm a big deal...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It looks like... I'm stuck wearing these suits for a while.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz
